text: aur jo (musharekeen) kuchh nahin jaanate kahate hain ki khuda hamase (khud) kalaam kyon nahin karata, ya hamaare paas (khud) koee nishaanee kyon nahin aatee, isee tarah unheen kee see baate vah kar chuke hain jo unase pahale the un sab ke dil aapas mein milate julate hain jo log yaqeen rakhate hain unako to apanee nishaaniyaan kyon saaphataur par dikha chuke
